resources.string:
Hi, 
My name is Nils, 
and I am trying to learn Kotlin, and with it write an app for Android. 
 
With this, I want to become not a developer, but somebody being able to work in IT. 
Because my current job's surround staled quite a bit, and I cannot move my place of work so easily, because the industry is down and nobody hires new people - they rather just all fire many of their people. 

That's how it is and we have to live with it, somehow. 

Still not enough text. 

Now? 

Now!
